title: Strictly scoped login + trial gameplay access gating adjustments (frontend-only)

requirements.summary: Keep all changes confined to authentication, pre-login experience, and trial-game allowlist gating without affecting existing modules or CRUD behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Authenticated users can still access and use all existing modules/pages with the same create/read/update/delete behavior as before.
Unauthenticated users remain restricted to the pre-login experience and the defined trial game allowlist; attempts to access other pages continue to redirect/block with English messaging.
No new pages/modules/features are introduced as part of this change set.

file_operations.description: Tighten and centralize client-side access gating by exporting a single source of truth for the trial-game allowlist and unauthenticated page allowlist, and ensure redirect/block messaging remains English-only. Keep changes strictly limited to login/pre-login/trial gating. Use the selected "authorization" componentâ€™s frontend guidance to ensure unauthenticated users cannot access application data and that logout clears cached app data; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Remove duplicated trial-game allowlist logic and consume the centralized trial allowlist exported from App-level gating so unauthenticated users can only launch allowlisted trial games, with consistent English lock/toast messaging. Keep changes strictly limited to trial gating behavior and do not alter game logic. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
